REPLACE:law_consumption_based_taxation = {
	group = lawgroup_taxation
	progressiveness = -100
	icon = "gfx/interface/icons/law_icons/consumption_based_taxation.dds"
	modifier = {
		state_bureaucracy_population_base_cost_factor_mult = -0.25
		country_consumption_tax_cost_mult = -0.5
	}
	tax_modifier_very_low = {
		tax_consumption_add = 0.15
	}
	tax_modifier_low = {
		tax_consumption_add = 0.2
	}
	tax_modifier_medium = {
		tax_consumption_add = 0.25
	}
	tax_modifier_high = {
		tax_consumption_add = 0.3
	}
	tax_modifier_very_high = {
		tax_consumption_add = 0.35
	}
	ai_will_do = {
		always = no
	}
	ai_enact_weight_modifier = {
		value = 0
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai_has_enact_weight_modifier_journal_entries = yes
			}
			add = 750
		}
	}
}

	group = lawgroup_taxation

	progressiveness = -50

		tax_consumption_add = 0.15
		tax_land_add = 5.6
	}
	tax_modifier_low = {
		tax_consumption_add = 0.2
		tax_land_add = 7.7

		tax_land_add = 11.9

		tax_consumption_add = 0.35
		tax_land_add = 14

		value = 0

}

	group = lawgroup_taxation
	progressiveness = 0
	icon = "gfx/interface/icons/law_icons/per_capita_based_taxation.dds"
	disallowing_laws = {
		law_traditionalism
	}
	unlocking_technologies = {
		currency_standards
	}
	tax_modifier_very_low = {
		tax_consumption_add = 0.15
		tax_per_capita_add = 5.6
		tax_land_add = 2.8
		tax_income_add = 0.05

	tax_modifier_low = {
		tax_consumption_add = 0.2
		tax_per_capita_add = 7.7
		tax_land_add = 3.85
		tax_income_add = 0.075

	tax_modifier_medium = {
		tax_consumption_add = 0.25
		tax_per_capita_add = 9.8
		tax_land_add = 4.9
		tax_income_add = 0.1

	tax_modifier_high = {
		tax_consumption_add = 0.3
		tax_per_capita_add = 11.9
		tax_land_add = 5.95
		tax_income_add = 0.125
	}
	tax_modifier_very_high = {
		tax_consumption_add = 0.35
		tax_per_capita_add = 14
		tax_land_add = 7
		tax_income_add = 0.15
	}
	ai_enact_weight_modifier = {
		value = 0
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai_has_enact_weight_modifier_journal_entries = yes
			}
			add = 750
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_technology_researched = civilizing_mission
					has_technology_researched = human_rights
					has_technology_researched = pan-nationalism
				}
				has_law_or_variant = law_type:law_land_based_taxation
			}
			add = 1000
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_journal_entry = je_sick_man_bureaucracy
					has_modifier = shogun_ig_forced_to_open_market
					has_journal_entry = je_meiji_main
					has_journal_entry = je_great_reforms_bureaucratic
					has_journal_entry = je_hawaii
					has_journal_entry = je_portugal_regeneration
				}
				has_law_or_variant = law_type:law_land_based_taxation
			}
			add = 5000
		}
	}
}

		tax_income_add = 0.2
		tax_dividends_add = 0.1

		tax_income_add = 0.25
		tax_dividends_add = 0.15

		tax_consumption_add = 0.35
		tax_income_add = 0.3
		tax_dividends_add = 0.2

		value = 0

			}
			add = 750
